text: Our workshop paper on synthesis in Uclid5 was accepted to SYNT '20!
Our presentation on performance fuzzing for SMT solvers was accepted to SMT '20!
We announced the Berkeley Programming Systems Seminar summer schedule!
I wrote about using a sequence solver to answer StackOverflow questions about DNA.
Murad Akhundov, my mentee, won the POPL Undergraduate Research Competition!
The Waterloo ML + Security + Verification Workshop was a success!
Check out our interactive visualization of archaeological sites in Colombia!
